parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the rear lift gate can lead to water intrusion, mold growth, and compromised structural integrity, potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Cracking of the rear lift gate
water entering the vehicle through the crack
and bubbling of the rear gate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The peeling and rusting of the paint can lead to compromised structural integrity, potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: and flaking off of paint in chunks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Jerking and Lift Gate Window Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission jerking and lift gate window issues can lead to accidents or injuries due to loss of control or obstruction of visibility.
symptoms: lift gate window hanging off hinges

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to jerk, slip, or hesitate when shifting gears, leading to loss of control, accidents, or strandings.
symptoms: Jerking or hesitation when shifting gears

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slipping and jerking can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or strandings.
Transmission valve body failure can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, or strandings.
Rear differential failure can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: which can be dangerous if not addressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Liftgate crack can cause the liftgate to malfunction, leading to safety issues.
symptoms: Crack around the Mercury emblem on the liftgate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Gear shift lever binding can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or strandings.
symptoms: causing the vehicle to shift into reverse instead of park.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Spark plug failure can cause the engine to malfunction, leading to loss of power and accidents.
symptoms: causing the engine to lose power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the engine to shut off, resulting in loss of power steering, brakes, and oil pressure, which can lead to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine shuts off while using cruise control
vehicle acceleration or deceleration without driver input.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if the vehicle is traveling at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
